name: Kid Orion
description:
Kid Orion is a short, twitchy, 5-level space exploration game made with PICO-8 and inspired by Lunar Lander and Solar Jetman. Find the landing pad to advance levels, but don't run out of fuel or health! Beware the Space Ram! 

Developed by Nick Santaniello. Features music by Mark DeNardo. Excellent faux box art by Jacob Smiley.
